South_Bend.University Park Mall: University Park Mall is a shopping mall in metropolitan South Bend (Mishawaka, Indiana) and is owned by Simon Property Group. The anchors are Macy's, JCPenney, Barnes & Noble and Sears. The mall was originally anchored by a 122,632 sq ft (11,392.9 m2) Hudson's and a 152,922 sq ft (14,206.9 m2) L. S. Ayres, which became Marshall Field's in 1997, before closing in 2006 and torn down in 2007.
